radiographic_examinations.findings: Nonmobile shadowing stone in the gallbladder neck with gallbladder distention. No wall edema or pericholecystic fluid. The liver shows no focal or textural abnormality. Normal Doppler assessment of the main portal vein. No intra- or extra-hepatic bile duct dilation. Common duct measuring 3 mm. Visualized portion of the pancreatic head and body are normal.
